Text:
*** PLEASE NOTE - I CAN ONLY SEED OVERNIGHT (USA EASTERN TIME - AFTER MIDNIGHT) - REGARDLESS OF WHAT TIME I UP'D THE TORRENT - PLEASE BE PATIENT - I WILL ALWAYS SEED UNTIL COMPLETED BY 25-50 PEOPLE ***

Please remember to seed and enjoy :-)

peace brothers and sisters !

Thanks for 2011 work.  

I was imagining you were clearing the decks of 2010 Gov't Mule, Allman Brothers etc before launching into 2011 works?

Jamaica in January would be a fair bit more comfortable than North America locked into a cold cold winter!
Thanks for another great album (with regards to your Allmans offer,have you got Live at the Atlanta International Pop Festival,or Hittin The Note?)
glad you are digging the Mule and Allman posts - I have a bunch more of the 2010 Mule shows to go and all of 2011 [not many as they took this year off] - enjoy brothers and sisters

re: [not many as they took this year off] 

Warren Haynes toured during Easter Downunder and I was lucky enough to see him at the Corner Hotel, standing about six feet away from him playing.
